title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 56-10.4 - Removal of waste from the site
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 56-10.4 - Removal of waste from the site

State Regulations

All waste generated as part of the asbestos project shall
be removed from the site within ten calendar days after successful completion
of Phase II C for all regulated abatement work areas at the site. All waste
generated during the asbestos project shall be legally disposed of at an
approved landfill facility. All generated waste removed from the site must be
documented, accounted for and disposed of in compliance with the requirements
of EPA NESHAP. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
56-10.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
